name: Fruit Cruise
description:
Collect as many sweet fruits and magical cakes as you can to satisfy your sweet teeth. You need to swap and match at least 3 identical fruits in a row. Come and discover all the amazing surprises!

Features:
- Over 200 amazingly exciting puzzles wait for your challenge
- Awesome surprises in brand new fruit paradise including Juice Castle, Lemon Maze, Peach Desert, Melon Hill and Fruit Iceland.
- Match more than 4 fruits to get the special bomb
- Eye-catching graphics and cool effects
- Uniquely wonderful obstacles: Mud, Cookie, Rattan etc.
- With the colorful and powerful boosters
- Completely free to play at anytime and anywhere

Start your brain to play this game with millions of other players!
